import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{createLink}from'@meshconnect/web-link-sdk';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OpenLinkWebSDK=_ref=>{let{onLinkTokenFetched}=_ref;const[linkToken,setLinkToken]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const fetchLinkToken=async()=>{setLoading(true);setError(null);try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/linkTokenCall',{method:'POST',headers:{'Accept':'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'}});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response error');}const result=await response.json();setLinkToken(result.linkToken);onLinkTokenFetched(result.linkToken);// Pass linkToken to parent component (popup window)
}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching link token:',error);setError(error.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchLinkToken();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error: ",error]}),linkToken&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Link Token fetched: ",linkToken]})]})});};export default OpenLinkWebSDK;
